titleStmt.title: Four Gospels, Book of Hours, Missal, Prayers, Sinodos

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

bibl.title: Yä-ʿUra Mäsqäl däbdabbe, Land-charter of ʿUra Mäsqäl

msItem.title: List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Mark
List of the "tituli" for the Gospel of Luke
Gospel of John (with titles and biography)
Saʿātāt za-nagh
msItem.incipit: f. 125r ወአዘዙ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ በሲኖዶሶሙ፡ እንዘ፡ ይብሉ፡ ነግሀ፡ ይጼልዩ፡ ባቲ፡ ለሰሚአ፡ ተምሕርት፡ (sic) ወተዓተቦ፡ (sic) ፍጽመ፡ መስቀል፡ ኵሎ(ሙ)፡ ምእምናን፡ ወምእምናት፤ ተንሢኦሙ፡ ነግሀ፡ እንዘ፡ ኢይገብሩ፡ ወኢምንተኒ፡ መፍቅዶሙ፡ ይትኀፀቡ፡ እደዊሆሙ፡ ወይጸልዩ፡ ኀበ፡ እግዚአብሔር።
msItem.explicit: ስማዕ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ቃልየ፡ ወለቡ፡ ጽራሕየ፨ ተወከፈኒ፡ ጸሎትየ፡ ከመ፡ ዕጣን፡ በቅድሜከ፡ ዘይሰማዕ፡ ግበር፡ ሊተ፡ ምሕረትከ፡ (sic) በጽብሕ። (sic)

msItem.incipit: ወካዕበ፡ ናስተበቍዕ፡ ዘኵሎ፡ ይእኅዝ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ (አቡሁ፡) ለእግዚእ፡ ወመድኀኒነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፨ እንዘ፡ ነአኵቶ፡ (sic) እስመ፡ ዓቀበነ፡ በኑኅ፡ (sic) ሌሊት፡ ወአብጽኀነ፡ እምጽልመት፡ ውስተ፡ ብርሃን፡ እሙስና፡ ውስተ፡ ዘኢይማሥን፡ እም፡ ኢይእምሮ፡ (sic) ውስተ፡ አእምሮ፡ አማን፨
msItem.explicit: f. 126v ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ዳግሚት፡ ሰማይ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ሙጻአ፡ ጸሓይ፨ ሰላም፡ ለከ፡ (sic) ዓንቀጸ፡ መድኀኒት፤ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ሙዳየ፡ ዕፍረት፤ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ እመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፤ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምሐኪ፡ ለባርኮተነ፡ (sic) ስፍሒ፡ እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: Prayer of the third hour
msItem.incipit: f. 126v በ፫፡ ሰዓት፡ መዝሙር፡ በ፮፨ ይቤ እግዚእ፡ ሊቀ፡ ከህናት፡ (sic) ዘቦአ፡ ውሣጤ፡ መን(ጦ)ላዕት፡ ... ጸሎት፡ በ፫፡ ሰዓት፡ በ፭፨ መኑ፡ ደመሮ፡ ለጸልመት፡ (sic) ምስለ፡ ብርሃን፡ ወለጽድቅ፡ ምስለ፡ ኀጢአት፨
msItem.explicit: f. 128r ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ሐመረ፡ ብዕልነ፨ ሰ(ላም፡ ለኪ)፨ መዝገበ፡ ወርቅነ፡ ሰ፨ አስከሬ(ነ)፡ ሰርጕነ፡ ሰ፨ ቀፀላ፡ ርእስነ፡ ሰ፨ ታቦተ፡ ኅግነ፡ ሰ፨ ድንግለ፡ እስራኤል፡ ጠባብ፡ ሰ፨ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምሐኪ፡ ለባርኮተነ፡ (sic) ስፍሒ፡ እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: Prayer of the sixth hour
msItem.incipit: f. 128r ጸሎት፡ በ፮፡ ሰዓት፡ በ፫፨ ከመ፡ ዝ፡ ይቤ፡ ጰውሎስ፡ ለብሔረ፡ ሮሜ፡ በምንትኑ፡ እንከ፡ አኀውየ፡ ጸሎትነ፡ ለእመ፡ ኢና(አ)ምር፡ ተስፋነ፨ ወባሕቱ፡ መንፈስ። ቅዱስ፡ ይትዋቅሥ፡ (sic) በእንቲአነ፡ በጸሎት፡ ዘኢይትአመር፨
msItem.explicit: f. 129r ሰላም፡ ለከ፡ (sic) አትሮንሰ፡ መለኮት፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨ (sic) መንበረ፡ ስብሐት፡ ሰለም፡ (sic) ለከ፨ (sic) ደብተራ፡ ብርሃን፡ ስፍሐት፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨ (sic) ንግሥተ፡ ይሁዳ፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨ (sic) ጸሐየ፡ መርመዳ፡ ሰላም፡ ለከ፨ (sic) ድንግልናዊት፡ እም፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ፨ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምኀኪ፡ ለባርኮተነ፡ (sic) ስፍሒ፡ እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: Prayer of the ninth hour
msItem.incipit: f. 129r ጸሎ(ት፡) በ፱ ሰዓት፡ በ፪፨ መዝሙር፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ይቤሎ፡ (sic) ሐዋርያት፡ በዲድስቅልያ፡ ገስጾሙኬ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጰስ፡ (sic) ለሕዝብከ፡ ወአዝዞሙ፡ ይምጽኡ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ መዓልተ፡ ወሌሊተ፡ ወግሞራ፡ (sic) ኢይርሐቁ፡ እምኔሁ፡ (sic)
msItem.explicit: f. 130v በከመ፡ ተሠጠ፡ መንጦላዕተ፡ ቤተ፡ መቅድስ፡ (sic) ጊዜ፡ ተሱዓት፡ አመ፡ ፀአተ፡ ነፍስከ፨ ሥጥጥ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ዕዳነ፡ በሕማመ፡ ሞትከ፤ ወጽሐፍ፡ (sic) አስማቲነ፡ ውስተ፡ ጕንደ፡ መስቀልከ፡ በቀለመ፡ ደምለ፨ ከመ፡ አንተ፡ በአብ፡ ወአብ፡ ብከ፨ ረስየኒ፡ ሱቱፋነ፡ ምስለ፡ አርዳኢከ፨ ወዝራእ፡ ውስተ፡ ልብነ፡ ወንጌለ፡ ፀጋከ፡ ጊዜ፡ ምሴት፡ ጸግወነ፡ ሰላምከ፤ (sic) እግዚኦ፡ መሐረነ፡ ክርስቶስ፨ ፲፪፡ ጊዜ፡ ወአቡነ፡ ዘበሰማያት፨ =፨

msItem.title: Ṣalota 12saʿāt ba-gize sark "Prayer of the twelfth hour, for the time of the twilight"
msItem.incipit: f. 132v በ፭። ህየነ፡ (sic) እዴከ፡ ትመርሀኒ፡ ወታነብረኒ፡ የማነከ። (sic) አይቴኑ፡ አኀውር፡ እመንፈስከ፡ ወአይቴኑ፡ እጐይይ፡ እምቅድመ፡ ገፅከ፡ ብጹዕ፡ ዘኀረይኮ፡ ወዘተ(ወ)ከፍኮ፡ ወዘአሕደርኮ፡ ውስተ፡ አዕፃዲከ፨
msItem.explicit: f. 133r ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ሐመረ፡ አድኅኖ፡ ዘጽድቅ፡ ሰለም፡ ለኪ። አስከሬነ፡ ወርቅ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ኮለ፡ ኢያሪኮ፡ ዘሐይቅ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ኖኅተ፡ ምሥራቅ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ሀገሪተ፡ ዕንቍ፡ ሰላም፡ ለኪ። ሐዳስ፡ ንድቅ፡ መደበለ፡ (sic) ማሕበር፡ ጽፉቅ፡ ሰለም፡ (sic) ለኪ። ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምኀኪ፡ ሱላሜ፡ እንተ፡ ሰርክ፡ ንትወፈይ፡ ሕዝብኪ፨

msItem.title: Ṣalota 3saʿāt lelit ba-gize nǝwām "Prayer of the third hour, for the time of the sleep"
msItem.incipit: f. 133r ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ መኑ፡ ይትዔረዮ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ በደመናት። ወመኑ፡ ይመስሎ፡ እምደቂቀ፡ አማልክት፡ መኑ፡ ሥሉጥ፡ በሩጸተ፡ ነፋ(ሳ)ት፡ ወበነኰርኳረ፡ መባርቀት፡ (sic)
msItem.explicit: f. 134r ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ መዝገ(በ)፡ ስርናይ፤ ሰ(ላም፡ ለኪ)፡ እመ፡ አዶናይ፨ ሰ፡ ዕንቆ፡ (sic) ባሕርይ፨ ሰ፡ ዓጸደ፡ ተክህኖ፨ ሰ፡ ዓንቀጸ፡ አድኅኖ፨ ሰ፡ ወለተ፡ ብርሃን፨ ሰ፡ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤመኃኪ፡ (sic) ለበርኮትነ፡ (sic) ስፍሕ፡ (sic) እዴኪ፨

msItem.title: Ṣalot za-manfaqe lelit "Prayer of the middle of the night"
msItem.incipit: f. 134r ጸሎተ፡ (sic) ዘመ(ን)ፈቀ፡ ሌሊት፤ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ በስመ፡ አብ፡ ... ሰዳዴሆሙ፡ (sic) ለአጋንንት፡ ስድዶሙ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ለአጋንንት፡ እምየማንነ፡ ወ(እ)ምፀጋምነ፤
msItem.note: The office contains the following prayers: for the sick, for the pilgrims, for the rain, Lk 7, 36-50, prayers to , for the fruits of the earth, for the water of the rivers, for the king, excerpts from an unidentified Psalm, Mt 25, 31-46, prayers for the sleepers, for the offerers, for the catechumens, for the peace, hymns to , Jn 19, 25-27, , a hymn to Mary erroneously entitled ፩ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዚአትነ፡ (sic) ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፨ ማርያም፡, Lk 11, 5-13

msItem.title: Hymns in honour of Our Lady Mary

msItem.incipit: f. 144v ሰላም፡ ሰለም፡ (sic) አመደ፡ (sic) ህርይ(ት፡) ዘኢትጽንን፡ ሰ(ላም)። ሐመረ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ ማርያም፡ ሰ። በሰጊድ፡ ንብለኪ፡ ንኤምሐኪ፡ ሀመረ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ማርያም፡
msItem.explicit: f. 145r ሰ(ላም)፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። ለዝክርክሙ፡ ሕይወት። ሶበ፡ ከናፍ(ር)የ፡ እከስት፤ ስመ፡ ዚአክሙ፡ በኵሉ፡ ሰዓት። ይሰማዕ፡ እምአፉየ፡ ወይደንግጽ፡ ሞት፨
msItem.note: Hymn to Our Lady Mary

msItem.incipit: f. 145r ተፈሥሒ፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግልተ፡ ሥጋ፡ ወህሊና፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ ማርያም፡ ወለተ፡ ኢያቄም፡ ውሐና፨ ጳጦስ፡ አንቲ፡ ዘአስተርአይከ፡ በደብረ፡ ሲና፨
msItem.explicit: f. 145v ምንተ፡ አዓስየኪ፡ እሴኪ፡ (sic) በእንተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዘገበርኪ፡ ሊተ፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግል፡ ዘታፈቅሪ፡ ምኅረተ። ሶበሰ፡ ትትዓቀቢ፡ ዘዚአየ፡ ኀጢአት። (sic) እመ፡ ኢሐየ(ወ)ክ፡ አሓተ፡ ሰዓተ፨
msItem.note: Hymn to Our Lady Mary

msItem.incipit: f. 145v ሰላም፡ ሰላም፡ አብል፡ (sic) ለኵሎን፡ መልክዕኪ። እመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ እምየ፡ እግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፤ ዓዲ፡ ሰላም፡ ለክልኤ፡ ማኅተመ፡ ድንግልናኪ፡
msItem.explicit: f. 146v ኦድንግል፡ ወለቱ፡ ለእስራኤል፡ ጽጌ፡ ከርስኪ፡ ልዑል፡ ኣማኑኤል፡ ጽጌ፡ ከርስኪ፡ ልዑል፡ ኣማኑኤል፨ (ሰ)ላም፡ ለድንግልና፡
msItem.note: Hymn to Our Lady Mary
Canons of the Apostles, 30 in number
Canons of Clement, 81 in number.
Canons of the Apostles, few in number.
Melkite Index
Canons of Ancyra, 24 in number.
Canons of Neocesarea, 14 in number.
Canons of Gangra, 20 in number: the text breaks off after Canon 18, on f. 169vb, l.13 .
Canons of Laodicea, canons 19-59. It is the continuation of .
msItem.incipit: f. 169vb, l.13 በእንተ፡ በዓል፡ ይጸውዖሙ፡ ለንኡስ፡ ክርስቲያን፡

msItem.note: Canons of Nicea, 20 in number
Canons of Nicea, 84 in number
Canons of Clement, which he received in a letter from St. Peter.
Canons of Sardes, 21 in number
Canons of Antioch, 25 in number
Canons of Laodicea, canons 1-19. It continuates as .
msItem.explicit: f. 197v በእንተ፡ ጸሎት፡ ... ወይደልዎሙ፡ ለኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ሶበ፡ ነበረ፡

msItem.note: On the computation of time.

msItem.incipit: f. 198r ወካዕበ፡ ለእመ፡ ጽህቀ፡ ታእምር፡ ለረኪበ፡ አበቅጤ። አሐዱ፡ በእንተ፡ ዘይኀድጉ፡ (sic) እስመ፡ ቀዳሜሁ፡ (sic) ለዓመት፡ ኣልቦ፡ (sic) ኣጳቅቴ፤
msItem.explicit: f. 199r በከመ፡ ይቤ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ወልድየ፡ ለእመ፡ ጠበብከ፡ ለርእስከ፡ ትጠብብ፡ ወለቢጽከ፡ ወይከውነከ፡ መዝገባ፡ ለምንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወዲበ፡ ኰኵሕ፡ ቀዊመ፡ ታጽንዕ፡ ዘውእቱ፡ በእእምሮ፡ (sic) እንተ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡
msItem.note: On the epact and the way to determine the moveable feasts in the 19-year cycle.

msItem.incipit: f. 199v በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወውልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ጸሐፍነ፡ ተዝከረ፡ (sic) አወደ፡ (sic) ዓመታተ፡ (sic) እምቀዳሚ፡ ኵነኔ፡ እስከ፡ ዕዝራ፡ ፶፻፡ ዓመታት፡ (sic) ወእምዕዝራ፡ እስከ፡ ልደተ፡ መድኀኒነ፡ ፭፻፡ ፺፫፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምልደቱ፡ እስከ፡ ጥምቀቱ፡ ለመድኀኒነ፡ ፴፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምጥምቀቱ፡ እስከ፡ ቅትለቱ፡ ፬፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምትንሣኤሁ፡ እስከ፡ ዓመተ፡ ድዮቅልጠያኖስ፨ (sic) ፪፻፡ ፹፭፡ ዓመት፡ ወእምድዮቅልጠ(ያ)ኖስ፡ እስከ፡ ሠርዓተ፡ (sic) ቅዱስ፨ ፫፻፡ ፲፰፡ ፵፩፡ ዓመት፡ ወኮነ፡ ኵሉ፡ ድሙር፡ እምቀዳሚ፡ ኵነኔ፡ እስከ፡ ዓመተ፡ ድዮቅልጠ(ያ)ኖስ፤ ፶፻፰፻፶፫፡
msItem.explicit: f. 202r ወአመ፡ ፰አመቱ፡ ለዮናታን፡ ንጉሠ፡ ይሁዳ፡ እስከ፡ ፭፻፡ ወ፴ወ፪፡ ዓመቱ፡ ለድዮቅልጥያኖስ፡ ዓመተ፡ ፲፻፡ ወ፭(፻)፡ ወ፺ወ፮፡ ወአመ፡ ፭፻፡ ወ፴ወ፫፡ ዓመተ፡ ድዮቅልጥ(ያ)ኖስ፡ እስከ፡ ፲፻፡ ወ፷ወ፭፡ ዓመቱ፡ ለድዮቅልጥ(ያ)ኖስ፡ ዓመተ፤ ፭፻፡ ወ፴፬፡ ወኮነ፡ ኵሉ፡ ድሙሩ፡ ዘእምቀዳማይ፡ ዓመቱ፡ ለአዳም፡ እስከ፡ ፲፻፡ ወ፷ወ፮፡ ለድዮቅልጥ(ያ)ኖስ፡ ይከውን፡ ፷፻፡ ወ፱፻፡ ፲ወ፮፨
msItem.note: Computation of the cycles of years according to several calendars (i.e., the Greek and Enoch systems) and chronological calculations.

msItem.title: Maṣḥafa ḥassāb
msItem.incipit: f. 202v መጽሐፍ፡ (sic) ሐሰብ። (sic) ቀዳሜሁ፡ (sic) ውእቱ፡ ቃል፡ ወውእቱ፡ ቃል፡ እምኀበ፡ እግዚ(አ)ብሔር፡ ወእግዚአብሔር፡ ውእቱ፡ ቃል፡ ... በቀደሚ፡ (sic) ገብረ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሰማየ፡ ወምድርሰ፡ ሀለወት፡ እምትካት፡ ወኢተስተርኢ፡ (sic) ወኢከነት፡ (sic) ድሉት፡ ወጽልመት፡ መልዕልተ፡ ቃላይ፡ (sic)
msItem.explicit: f. 209r ወለእመ፡ ፈቀድከ፡ ታአምር፡ (sic) በ(እ)ንተ፡ ዘያአቱ፡ ፪፡ ዕለተ፡ ለረኪቦተ፡ ዕለተ፡ ዮሓንስ፡ እስመ፡ ቀዳሚሁ፡ ለዓመት፡ (sic) ዲዮቅልጥ(ያ)ኖስ፡ ዐርብ፡ መለረኪበ፡ (sic) ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ያአቱ፡ ፪፡ ዓርብ፡ ወሰንበተ፡ አይሁ(ድ)፡ ወይብልዋ፡ ኪያሃ፡ አሐቲ፡ አለት፡ (sic) ቅድመ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨
msItem.note: The text is preceded by a number of tables for determination of the year of indiction, the number of the epagomenal days, the epact and the ṭǝntyon since the origin of the world.
Tables for determination of the moveable feasts.
Calendar of saints, arranged according to their feast day.
msItem.incipit: f. 212r በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልደ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ በዘ፡ ንጽሕፍ፡ አርእስት፡ በዓላ(ት፡) በወርሐ፡ መስከረም። ፩ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡ ወበርተሎሚወስ፡ (sic) ሐዋርያ፡ ወራጎኤል፡ (sic) <ሊቀ፡> መላእክ <ት>፡ ወኢዮብ፡ ጸድቅ፨ (sic) ውስተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ምድር፡ ወጽአ፡ ነገሮሙ፨
msItem.explicit: f. 214v ኣመ፡ ፬፡ በአማን። (sic) አመ፡ ፭፡ አበ፡ (sic) መግደር፡ ኪየከ፡ (sic) ተወከሉ፡ አበዊነ፨

msItem.note:
Qǝddāse Yoḥannǝs ʾAfa Warq za-qwǝrbān "Anaphora of John Chrysostom on the offering". The text follows the text edited in Chrestomathia Aethiopica edita et glossario explanata
August Dillmann
Lipsiae Weigel 1866 51-56 up to f. 216vb, l.4 , then few passages are added.
msItem.explicit: f. 218r በላዓክሙ፡ (sic) ጸገብክሙ፡ ሰተይክሙ፡ ረወይክሙ፡ በሰላም፡ እትው፡ (sic) ውስተ፡ አብያቲክሙ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ የሀሎ፡ (sic) መ(ስ)ሌክሙ፨ (sic)

msItem.note: Hymn to Our Lady Mary with a commemoration of the Apostles.
msItem.incipit: f. 218v ተዘኪረኪ፡ ማርያም፡ ስቅለተ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ አምደ፡ ሮሜ፡ ኰኵ(ሕ)፡ ብሂል፡ ዘበትርጓሜ(ሁ፡)
msItem.explicit: f. 218v ፰ተዘኪረኪ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘአስጠምዎ፡ ውስተ፡ ባሕር፡ ለበርተሎሜዎ(ስ)፡ ምምሕር፡ (sic)

collation.note: Quires are numbered with Arabic numerals on the lower outer margin of the first folio of each quire. Most of them are abraded.

handNote.desc: It is the same hand as Canons of the Council of Nicaea. The numerals are written without dashes; ፮ has the loop open, looking like “compressed” ፯; ፪ has angular and not separated loops.
handNote.seg: Nomina sacra, titles, liturgical admonishments; elements of the text dividers; Ethiopic numerals.

item.quote: اذكر يا رب عبدك الخاطي المسكين قسيس غبريال المصري قاصد البطرك الاسكندراني وراهب دير العذرى مريم جبل الطير واذكر يا رب كاللذين يذكرنا من الابهات الحبش

"Remember, o my Lord, your servant, the poor sinner priest Ġabriyāl the Egyptian, delegate of the Alexandrine patriarch and monk of the Monastery of the Virgin Mary of Ǧabal al-Ṭayr; and remember, o Lord, those who will commemorate us amongst the Ethiopian fathers".
item.note: The note is written in Arabic on the front board on its inner side. It was drawn up by the Egyptian priest Ġabriyāl.

item.quote: ወተፈጸመ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ሴኖዶስ፡ በዋርኀ፡ ግንቦት፡ ፰፡ በሰርቀ፡ መልአት፡ ፫፡ በሰርቀ፡ ሌሌት። (sic) በመዋዕለ፡ ወን(ጌ)ላዊ፡ ማቴዎስ፡ ፮፼፡ (sic) ወ፭፻፡ ፹ወ፭፡ ዓመተ፡ አደም። (sic)
item.note: The note is written in red ink and states that the Sinodos was completed on the 8th of Gǝnbot in the year of Adam 6585, year of Matthew. The date can not be assessed with certainty: it might correspond to 1593 AD or be incorrect.
Historical note on the monastic community of .

item.quote: ፷፼ወ፮፻፲ወ፮ዓምት። (sic) ሰረቀ፡ (sic) መስከረም፡ እሁድ፡ ሰረቀ፡ ጥቅምት፡ ሰሉስ። ኅዳር፡ ሐሙስ፡ ትሕሳስ፡ (sic) ቀደሚ፡ (sic) ሰንበት። ጥር፡ ሰኑይ። የካቲት፡ ረቡዕ። መጋቢተ፡ ዓርብ። ሚያዚያ፡ (sic) እሁድ። ግንቦት፡ ሰሉስ። ሰኔ፡ ሐሙስ። ሐምሌ፡ ቀዳሚ፡ ሰንበት፡ ነሐሴ፡ ሰነይ። (sic) ጳጉሜን፡ (sic) ረቡዕ፡ በዘመነ፡ ዮሐንስ።
item.note: The note refers to the year 6616, year of John. The date can not be assessed with certainty; it might correspond to 1624 AD or be incorrect.

item.quote: እምኀበ፡ ለአከ፡ ... ማⶂⶂሮአም፡ (?) ዘሮማ፡ ትብጸሕ፡ (sic) ኢ(የ)ሩሰሌ(ም፡)
item.note: The note is hardly legible because of the faded ink. It mentions Rome and Jerusalem.

item.quote: Missale; n° 1. Aduerte Lector hunc Codicem esse Vitiosissime scriptum ejusq(ue) autoritatem exigui valoris.
"Missal; nr. 1. Be careful o reader, that this codex is very defective and its reliability is of low value".
item.note: Note written by a later librarian and by Wansleben concerning the reliability of the manuscript. The note was probably written in 1665.
Note written by a later librarian.
Two lines containing the incipit of Letter of Eusebius to Carpianus, as in lines 3 እንዘ፡ - 7 እመትሎሆሙ፡ .
Note written on the upper margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the upper margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the upper margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the upper margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.

item.quote: Nota b(ene) Maximum hic esse errore. confundit et miscet enim hic duo Concilia. Stulte idem error et jam est in Cod(ice) Magni Duc(is) Florentiae. Sed Cod(ex) Abiss(inoru)m et meus bene habent o(mn)ia notauit a(utem) Fr(ater) G(iovanni) M(ichahel) Vanslebius Ord. Praed.

"Nota bene: a serious error is here, as (the scribe) confuses and blends here two councils. The same error is also trivially attested in the manuscript of the Grand Duke of Florence (i.e, ). However, the manuscript of the Ethiopians (i.e., of San Stefano dei Mori, (i.e, ) and mine display everything correctly. Brother Johann Michael Wansleben annotated (this)".
item.note: Note written in the intercolum by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer upper margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer upper margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.
Note written on the outer margin by Wansleben probably in 1665.

item.quote: Aduerte Lector huc referri debere illos Canones quos scriptor supra ad conciliu(m) Gangerense annexuit.
"Be careful o reader, that here you have to refer to those canons that the scribe previously appended to the council of Gangra".
item.note: Note written by Wansleben probably in 1665.

item.quote: "Salve Regina... ladi zet chgrafi uin nero agua materi guortelo eledo uiniga po pais do uai".
item.note: The note is written on the back board on its inner side, probably in a Vulgar language. The meaning is poorly understandable.

list.item: Quires are numbered with Arabic numerals on the lower outer margin of the first folio of each quire. Most of them are abraded.

binding.decoNote: Two boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather.
Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover.

origin.p:
An origin from Jerusalem has been conjectured, together with Ms. , cp. I manoscritti etiopici di J.M. Wansleben nella biblioteca nazionale centrale di Firenze Rassegna di Studi Etiopici
Alessandro Bausi
1991 33 (1989) 5-33 http://www.jstor.org/stable/41292808 12
Johann Michael Wansleben’s manuscripts and texts. An update Essays in Ethiopian Manuscript Studies. Proceedings of the International Conference Manuscripts and Texts, Languages and Contexts: the Transmission of Knowledge in the Horn of Africa, Hamburg, 17-19 July 2014 Supplement to Aethiopica
Alessandro Bausi
Alessandro Bausi
Alessandro Gori
Denis Nosnitsin
Eugenia Sokolinski
Wiesbaden Otto Harrassowitz 2015
Supplement to Aethiopica 4
197-244 4 215-216 . The Ms. had been preserved in (cp. ) before being incorporated into the .

bibl.title: Bybliothecae apostolicae Vaticanae codices manu scripti recensiti iussu Pii XI Pontificis maximi. Codices Aethiopici Vaticani et Borgiani, Barberinianus orientalis 2, Rossianus 865, I: Enarratio codicum; II: Prolegomena, Indices, Tabulae
I manoscritti etiopici di J.M. Wansleben nella biblioteca nazionale centrale di Firenze
Rassegna di Studi Etiopici

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.
